body.description: Beautiful stationery is a pleasure to use Versatile design is suitable for a variety of occasions Keep a box on hand for whenever a handwritten letter is warranted. Sheet size (5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high) allows you to write expansively. Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp, smooth-finish sheets and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper. Stationery set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Brighten their day Nothing is more personal than a handwritten letter. Stay in touch!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Blue Flowers Boxed Stationery Sheets Enjoy the fine art of letter writing with designer stationery sheets and matching envelopes

Add flair to your personal correspondence Delicate detailing A delicate floral design appears along the bottom of each crisp letter sheet. Flecks of silver foil add extra flourish. Pale blue background. Board box with clear acetate lid contains 30 letter sheets and 24 matching envelopes. Superior stationery sheets Write with confidence. Substantial smooth-finish writing sheets take a variety of pens beautifully. Fountain pens glide over the page. 24 matching envelopes Our Blue Flowers design is replicated on the flaps of the matching envelopes. Stationery envelopes are constructed of quality paper.

Beautiful stationery is a pleasure to use Versatile design is suitable for a variety of occasions Keep a box on hand for whenever a handwritten letter is warranted. Sheet size (5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high) allows you to write expansively. Exceptional value Premium boxed set features crisp, smooth-finish sheets and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper. Stationery set comes in an attractive box suitable for gift-giving. Brighten their day Nothing is more personal than a handwritten letter. Stay in touch! About our Blue Flowers Letter-Perfect Stationery Sheets: Set comes with 30 designer letter sheets Includes 24 matching stationery envelopes Each sheet measures 5-3/4” wide x 7-3/4” high Stationery set comes in a sturdy matching box with a clear acetate lid

Gold Dots Stationery Set (Boxed Stationery) Butterflies: Letter-perfect Stationery (Letter-perfect Stationery Series) Watercolor Birds Stationery Set (Boxed Stationery) Fuchsia Blooms Stationery Set (Boxed Stationery) Hydrangeas Stationery Set (Boxed Stationery) Blue Elegance (Stationery) (Letter-Perfect Stationery Series)

Our Company History In 1928, at the age of twenty-two, Peter Beilenson began printing books on a small press in the basement of his parents’ home in Larchmont, New York. Peter—and later, his wife, Edna—sought to create fine books that sold at prices even a pauper could afford. Today, still family owned and operated, Peter Pauper Press continues to honor our founders’ legacy—and our customers’ expectations—of beauty, quality, and value. Image: Peter Pauper Press headquarters, circa 1948.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stationery is the perfect touch for any sweet letter! The designs are high quality and beautiful! Will definitely purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty writing paper
reviews.reviewText: Writing paper is almost a thing of the past. This writing paper is good quality, has a delicate in yet classic design. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great quality paper and beautiful stationery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Quality
reviews.reviewText: Things I wondered before buying... Is the base color (in this case blue) also on the back? Yes, it is. Does the paper have a good weight/body to it? Yes, it is quality paper especially at this price point. Will it handle different ink types? Yes, I used the top sheet displayed inside the see through lid to test ink types and colors. It wrote well with a ballpoint as well as different size roller gel pens. I chose the gel and it dried without smearing as it tends to do on cheap paper. Is the pattern embossed? Just a little, it has very thin silver lines in the flowers. Pretty, pretty paper!It is really nice and I know it will be a nice addition to my stationery supplies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice design
reviews.reviewText: This set of Blue Flowers stationery put out by Peter Pauper is very nice. The design has a bit of glitter to it and makes it seem even more special to the recipient. The paper itself is of a nice weight and overall is well made. Finding stationery where I live is next to impossible - the stores only carry note card sets. There are times when I like to share news that will take more space than a note card will allow, hence my search for stationery sets. I just wish it included more pages for the amount of envelopes included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Stationery For Letter Writers
reviews.reviewText: This beautiful stationery has become my signature letter paper. I’m on my second box this year and plan to buy more. It’s so pretty and the paper is a substantial, heavy weight that just soaks up the ink nicely so it doesn’t run and bleed everywhere. I love to write letters and it’s lovely to find pretty paper to keep this dying art alive with my close friends and family. They say they know it’s from me immediately by the distinctive paper even before they see the return address. I love that. Some have complained the design takes up too much space, where as I feel that’s why there is double the amount of paper than average boxes - so you can use two written pages and still appreciate the beautiful design. It’s stationery. It’s meant to be used up! Write lots of letters :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This paper is lovely - beautiful delicate design
reviews.reviewText: This paper is lovely - beautiful delicate design. and the price is right! I am so pleased to have found Peter Pauper Stationery and will order more. The texture and size is excellent for short personal computer letters - front and back using the program "Word" and Paper Size 5 "x 7" . I set the top margin at 0.15" and the other 3 margins at 0.5" and get approximately 3/4" margins all around on this 5 3/4" x 7 3/4" paper. I also suggest setting the font size of 12 in italics to make the letter look personal. I am now 94 years old and my handwriting has deteriorated so prefer to write personal correspondence using the computer. I hope this helps others who wish to use this paper.With best wishes and many many thanksMoira Breenmoirasbreen@sbcglobal.net

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very classy gift
reviews.reviewText: Good quality, very attractive but most importantly very well received as a gift.

This stationary is beautiful and well-made! The quality and care is so obvious in the work. I grew up writing letters and collecting stationary. It doesn’t seem to be something many kids do nowadays, but I’ll always have fond memories and writing letters by hand will be something I hope to pass down. I’m really glad Peter Pauper Press makes these! And so well, too! Thank you!

reviews.reviewTitle: This is very good quality note paper
reviews.reviewText: This is very good quality and pretty note paper. The size is just right for writing a few substantial paragraphs. The receiver will feel special when they receive your note.

I have found it difficult to locate good quality stationery both online and in stores. This stationery comes from England and is worth waiting for. It arrived in less than the promised two weeks and I am very happy to finally have traditional, top quality paper to use for my letters. They may not be as often as they used to but there is still a need!
Really really pretty! Would buy again
I would have given this a 5 star but with the delivery the package had a big tear in it and the parcel was also hanging half way out of the package!!
